subTitle: Homeowner - Richmond
title: Sarah Mitchell
desc: Cooling Service Melbourne saved our summer! Our split system broke down during the heatwave and they were out the same day. Professional, reliable and reasonably priced. Highly recommend calling 0405133761.

subTitle: Business Owner - Carlton
title: David Chen
desc: Excellent service for our office ducted system. The technician was knowledgeable, explained everything clearly, and completed the repair quickly. Our staff were comfortable again within hours. Will definitely use them again.

subTitle: Resident - Hawthorn
title: Jessica Taylor
desc: Outstanding emergency service! Our evaporative cooling failed on a 40-degree day. They responded within 2 hours and had us cool again by evening. Professional technicians who really know their stuff. Thank you!

subTitle: Property Manager - Toorak
title: Michael Roberts
desc: We use Cooling Service Melbourne for all our rental properties. Always prompt, fair pricing, and quality work. Their maintenance service has prevented costly breakdowns. Great communication and reliable service every time.
